original_title: A Senior CIA officer for 30 years confirms the psychological operations they use overseas were turned against Donald Trump and the American People to keep Democrats in power  — The Donald
article_summary: A retired senior CIA officer has confirmed that psychological operations used overseas were allegedly turned against Donald Trump and the American people to maintain Democratic power, according to a post by I-am-Orlando PRO. The operations are said to have been made possible by the removal of the Smith-Mundt Act in 2013, allowing propaganda to be disseminated on news and airwaves.</s>
